## Description

Apply the "Glassmorphism" aesthetic and polish the UI components.

## Tasks

- [ ] Implement Glassmorphism utility classes (backdrop-blur, semi-transparent backgrounds) in Tailwind config.
- [ ] Apply glass styles to Sidebar, Header, and Cards.
- [ ] Style the `xterm.js` container to resemble a native terminal window (Mac/Linux style controls).
- [ ] Ensure consistent "Dark Mode" palette throughout the app.

## Reference

- See `docs/agent-docs/ANALYSIS_UI_UX.md` Phase 3.
